description: The island had been part of Hitler's Atlantic Wall and the first residents returned to devastation.
title: Alderney Homecoming 75th anniversary marked
title_page: Alderney Homecoming 75th anniversary marked - BBC News
maintext: Courteney Benfield, who took part in the re-enactment, said: "It's important we never forget something so big like this because it affected so many people's lives in so many different ways and it still does to this day."
